Change Log
==========

1.0.0 (08/01/2022)
-------------------
- First Release

1.0.1 (08/01/2022)
-------------------
- Added data key for indicators that requires single set of prices

1.0.2 (09/01/2022)
-------------------
- Bug fixes
- Added breakeven price to position and "get_breakeven_price" utility method

1.0.3 (09/01/2022)
-------------------
- Bug fixes
- Removed indicators
- Added new metrics to report
